Learn More

Value

NCTA is a group that is proactive, transparent and honest with its members. This is for all types of carriers; fleets and mom and pops, as well as varied affiliates catering to those carriers. With changes occurring every day with technology, safety and a mountain of legislative issues, NCTA is the best value to keep your company current and apprised of future trends so you can continue to grow.

Pride

Carriers and Affiliates have a lot of pride. They have pride in North Carolina and the lifestyle this great state has afforded them. The individuals that started or have grown these companies take great pride in the jobs they've created for North Carolinian's and their families.

Advocacy

The North Carolina Trucking Association has you covered with every kind of information to help train your people, make you safer and they have your back. NCTA has strong advocacy within the NC legislature as well as the powerful American Trucking Association. Our mission is to protect the rights and the roads for all carriers, especially in the great state of North Carolina.

May 22, 2023 - NCTA and the Safety and Human Resource Council is pleased to announce the 2023 Driver of the Year and the 2022 Driver of the Month Winners. Click here for the full press release.
